linkMau2.name: Link to Mau2
linkMau2.description: Adds a link to the japanese voice cast page on Mau2
inputButtonColors.name: Colorful Buttons
inputButtonColors.description: Ever clicked the wrong button? Now, all 'Replace' buttons are orange, and all 'Remove' buttons are red.
mau2Translator.name: Translator (mau2.com)
mau2Translator.description: Adds buttons on mau2.com to translate the entries into Romaji and English
keyboardShortcuts.name: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Adds various keyboard shortcuts for adding data more easily
keyboardShortcuts.note: This module currently supports anime voice actor lists and episode lists only. Above each list, you'll find a button to enable shortcuts for that specific area. You can then use the shortcuts shown on screen besides the elements to focus them (inputs) or click them (buttons & checkboxes). Tip: If you're focused on an input, you press ESC to unfocus it.
